price: 199. Nabiyow koo kee kummat sinaamak meqe cal kee meqe taamoomi oggola, keenik gibdim keenik magurrusinaay meqe maxcoo kee meqe abinah ken amris, kasmaleelat mangalinaay tuugima magiddiyinaay derre keenit cab.
arabic: خُذِ ٱلۡعَفۡوَ وَأۡمُرۡ بِٱلۡعُرۡفِ وَأَعۡرِضۡ عَنِ ٱلۡجَٰهِلِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: khudhi al-ʿafwa wamur bil-ʿur'fi wa-aʿriḍ ʿani al-jāhilīna
